propositions.text: User must comply with relevant laws and regulations.
User must respect Txt Xue Wang copyright.
Txt Xue Wang authors own Txt Xue Wang copyright.
User must not steal or spread Txt Xue Wang content.
Txt Xue Wang reserves the right to pursue legal responsibility.
All Txt Xue Wang content is for learning and research purposes only.
Txt Xue Wang is not responsible for any losses incurred by users from using Txt Xue Wang content.
If we could live forever, what would we be like?
Immortality is about how one lives.
Endless repetition would be no different from being dead.
Immortality could mean eternally repeating this life, which would be boring.
The speaker does not find it boring; she can do things the listener cannot.
She can make the listener live a rich and flavorful life.
With immortality, there is infinite time to explore, learn, and experience.
She can take the listener around the world to see beautiful scenery, eat delicious food, and hear moving music.
She can help the listener live the life they desire.
She can help the listener become any person they wish to be.
The listener could become a great artist, scientist, or adventurer.
With immortality, one does not fear failure or time.
One can attempt and challenge infinitely.
One can live as a true legend.
Immortality is exciting because there are infinite opportunities to experience, feel, and love.
One can live as someone who truly loves life.
Immortality can lead to happiness.
The listener wants to live forever.
The listener is willing to pay any price for immortality.
The listener agrees to follow her.
She has a secret about immortality that only she knows.
The secret's price is too high.
The listener is still willing despite the high price.
The listener is willing to pay the price because she is worth it.
The listener asks her to marry him.
If she marries him, she will be his person.
They can achieve immortality together.
They will bear the price of immortality together.
She asks him to go with her to their place of immortality.
The place of immortality is a place only she knows.
The place of immortality is where only the two of them will be.

concepts.name: Txt Xue Wang
concepts.context: Refers to the source of the text and its user agreement.

concepts.name: Copyright
concepts.context: Relates to the ownership and protection of content from Txt Xue Wang.

concepts.name: User
concepts.context: Refers to individuals accessing and using Txt Xue Wang content.

concepts.name: Legal responsibility
concepts.context: The consequences for violating Txt Xue Wang's terms of service.

concepts.name: Immortality
concepts.context: The central theme of the narrative, the desire for eternal life and its implications.

concepts.name: Repetition
concepts.context: A negative aspect of potential immortality, making life feel like death.

concepts.name: Life
concepts.context: The quality and experience of living, especially in the context of immortality.

concepts.name: Experience
concepts.context: The act of undertaking activities and gaining knowledge, a benefit of immortality.

concepts.name: Time
concepts.context: The abundance of time granted by immortality, allowing for exploration and learning.

concepts.name: Legend
concepts.context: The potential to become a notable and celebrated figure through immortal endeavors.

concepts.name: Love
concepts.context: An emotion that can be deepened and experienced endlessly with immortality.

concepts.name: Happiness
concepts.context: A state of being that can be achieved through a fulfilling immortal life.

concepts.name: Secret
concepts.context: The hidden knowledge that enables immortality.

concepts.name: Price/Cost
concepts.context: The sacrifice or consequence associated with attaining immortality.

concepts.name: Worth
concepts.context: The justification for paying the price for immortality, related to the value of the person or the goal.

concepts.name: Marriage
concepts.context: A commitment and union between the two protagonists.

concepts.name: Place of immortality
concepts.context: A specific, hidden location associated with achieving immortality.

hierarchy.structure: The document begins with a user agreement for a website (Txt Xue Wang), followed by a philosophical discussion about the concept of immortality, and then a narrative dialogue between two characters exploring the desire for, and the pursuit of, immortality, culminating in a commitment and a journey to a place of immortality. The structure moves from practical rules to abstract contemplation, and then to a personal story.
